name: @mof-ivy/ivy-nest-strategies-common-module
description: Common package for NestJS strategies. It provides a set of useful tools (modules, services, models etc) to easily build strategies in NestJS for Ivy

scripts.pub: echo "Commit message: " && read message && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m "$message" && npm version patch && npm publish && git push origin main

author: Caius Citiriga
